content.html: So my server has been hacked again so I'm just going to migrate it elsewhere. But it costs way too much and half the stuff I don't use. I don't want to manage a server anymore. Current cost is $63/mo We have 4 services to migrate - let's go!
content.value:
So my server has been hacked again so I'm just going to migrate it elsewhere. But it costs way too much and half the stuff I don't use. I don't want to manage a server anymore.
